items.title: View from the mountain
items.text: It was the view from our first house, bewitching and high. Soon it was necessary to go down by car down the mountain thickets...

items.title: Dark expanse
items.text: Water, icy and inviting. The color from which the spirit froze...

items.title: Water
items.text: At the bottom, having moved down the hill, we were able to see the water for the first time. This incredible green-blue shade of icy water flowing from the mountains...

items.title: On top of the mountains
items.text: Having driven for the first time along the serpentine to the very height, we saw a landscape of green shrubs and endless mountain peaks...

items.title: Calm element
items.text: And if on the ferry and inland, the dark calm element of the abyss opens...

items.title: Waterfall
items.text: The waterfall below is light and bubbling, but we had to go to the very top along the troll stairs. With a slight sinking heart, holding the gas pedal...

items.title: Wild berries
items.text: Handfuls of wild cranberry and blueberry bushes are scattered on the slopes of the mountains. Each berry conceals the power of mountain air and freedom...

items.title: In the clouds
items.text: And if you climb one of the mountains, high and go to the edge of the cliff, you can see the incredible distance of the mountain ranges and the frightening veil of the abyss...

items.title: Seething
items.text: There was very little time left and it was important to get to the waterfall before dark. Stepping on the nearest, slippery, moss-covered stone, I started running...
